TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Certificate extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the X.509 digital certificate that has been used to create a signature.

remarks.para: Use the property of the object to return a Certificate object.
This type or member can be accessed only from code running in forms opened in Microsoft InfoPath Filler.

example.para: In the following example, the property of the Certificate class is used to determine the status and other information about the digital certificate used for the first signature on the first set of signed data (or for the entire form, if the entire form is configured to be signed), and display that information in a message box.
example.code: Imports Microsoft.VisualBasic.ControlChars Public Sub CertificateStatusAlert() Dim myCertificate As Certificate = _ Me.SignedDataBlocks(0).Signatures(0).Certificate MessageBox.Show("IssuedTo: " & myCertificate.IssuedTo & _ NewLine & "IssuedBy: " & myCertificate.IssuedBy & _ NewLine & "ExpirationDate: " & myCertificate.ExpirationDate & _ NewLine & "Status: " + myCertificate.Status.ToString()) End Sub

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ExpirationDate As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ ExpirationDate { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the expiration date of a digital certificate in the localized 'SHORTDATE' format.
Docs.value: The expiration date of a digital certificate in the localized 'SHORTDATE' format.

remarks.para: This member can be accessed only by forms running in the same domain as the currently open form, or by forms that have been granted cross-domain permissions.
This type or member can be accessed only from code running in forms opened in Microsoft InfoPath Filler.

public: abstract property System::String ^ IssuedBy { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the issuer of the digital certificate.
Docs.value: The name of the issuer of the digital certificate.

remarks.para: This member can be accessed only by forms running in the same domain as the currently open form, or by forms that have been granted cross-domain permissions.
This type or member can be accessed only from code running in forms opened in Microsoft InfoPath Filler.

public: abstract property System::String ^ IssuedTo { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the user to whom the digital certificate was issued.
Docs.value: The name of the user to whom the digital certificate was issued.

remarks.para: This member can be accessed only by forms running in the same domain as the currently open form, or by forms that have been granted cross-domain permissions.

Docs.summary: Gets the status of the digital certificate as a enumerated constant.
Docs.value: A value that represents the status of the digital certificate.

remarks.para: This member can be accessed only by forms running in the same domain as the currently open form, or by forms that have been granted cross-domain permissions.
